projects
item.description: Entwined Entwined is a game about two souls, a bird and a fish, that are in love but canâ€™t be together. Once united, the two souls will transform into a magnificent soaring dragon. Its available on PS4, PS3, Vita, iOS and Android. Ninja ChallengeIt uses head tracking as a gameplay mechanic. The player should move their head to the designed position to find the weak spot on the ninjas and punch them.

item.title: About
item.description: Hi! I’m Jitesh. I am currently working as a programmer at Sony’s PixelOpus Studio in San Mateo. We released our first game called Entwined for PS4, PS3, PS Vita, iOS and Android. It is the first commercial game that I worked on and will always have a special place in my heart. Before joining Sony, I got my Masters in Entertainment Technology from Carnegie Mellon’s Entertainment Technology Center (ETC). During this period, I did an internship at Microsoft where I worked with the Kinect Fun Labs team to create a bite-sized experience called Ninja Challenge.
